channel.title: BackScape | 317 | Econ | Pvp | Skilling | FUN=D
channel.description:
[CENTER][url=http://www.drapli.com][IMG]http://drapli.com/logo.png[/img][/url]
Backscape was an idea I had on making a new Runescape server that brings you back to the days when runescape was awesome! Back in 2007 when the wilderness had no limitations and everything was great! Well thats what Backscape is! I have download a blank source and started programming all the old stuff in got the combat system almost done working on all the skills! But I cant work on this all on my own I'm gonna need help to get this to where I want it to be! So if you have any ideas or any programming please feel free to message me:)
[/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img][size=2][B]Combat:[/B][/size]
[ul][li][COLOR=Green]PvP[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=Green]PvN[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=Green]Max hit formulas[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=Green]Accuracy formula[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=Green]weapon special attack[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=Green]Equipment effects[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=Green]Equipment requirements[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=Green]Degradable equipment[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img][SIZE=2][B]Skills:[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][li][COLOR=Green]Mining[/color][/li] [li][COLOR=Green]Thieving[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=Green]Fishing[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=Yellow]Woodcutting[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img][SIZE=2][B]Sounds/Music:[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][li][COLOR=Yellow]Sounds[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=Yellow]Music[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img][SIZE=2][B]Miscellaneous:[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][li][COLOR=Green]Skill interfaces[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=Green]Repairing broken/degraded items[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=Yellow]Treasure trails[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://drapli.com/PP.png[/img] [IMG]http://drapli.com/M.png[/img] [IMG]http://drapli.com/WC.png[/img] [IMG]http://drapli.com/F.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Tmesis:

You should also change “You pickpocket the npc” to "You pickpocket the " + npc.getName() + “.”

didnt see that either :o

also whats that blueish white thing on the ground above the player in the picture?

Doesnt appear as a drop on the minimap :o

item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

The whole ‘remake’ concept is broken when simple things are spelled wrong. Always spellcheck your work:

I honestly hope that was a typo and you know the difference between ‘where’ and ‘were’.
